headline: Assessing NVR (NVR) Valuation After Recent Share Price Gains And Mixed Long Term Returns
summary: NVR (NVR) recently drew investor attention after closing at US$7,718.38, with returns of about 1% over the past day, 6% over the past month, and 8% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for NVR. Those short term moves sit against a year to date share price return of 6.04%, while the 1 year total shareholder return is roughly flat. The 3 and 5 year total shareholder returns of 49.89% and 62.80% point to longer term momentum that has been much stronger than the recent picture...
